name: Lash
description:
Controller recommended! 

Lash is a procedurally generated dungeon crawler where you can control your gravity... and that of the enemies! Can you fight your way to the end?

Made in a week for the 7DRL 2020 jam!

Post jam version includes some quality of life improvements, like highlighting the enemies in your gravity change field, and the addition of rocks that you can throw, as well as some new rooms to add some variety to the game.

Credits:

Game developed by Hadi

Characters by Szadi Art.

Tileset by Chayed.

Music by Per (made for Ludum Dare 44)
